original_text: And ye shall eat the flesh of your sons, and the flesh of your daughters shall ye eat.
korean_text: 너희가 아들의 살을 먹을 것이요 딸의 살을 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And ye shall eat the flesh of your sons
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 너희 아들의 살을 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the flesh of your daughters shall ye eat
